com.jmex.physics.geometry
Class PhysicsSphere

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.SceneElement
      com.jme.scene.Spatial
          com.jmex.physics.PhysicsCollisionGeometry
              com.jmex.physics.geometry.PhysicsSphere
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, java.io.Serializable
public abstract class PhysicsSphere
extends PhysicsCollisionGeometry

Sphere simply has a radius of 1 and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and radius via uniform local scale.

Author:
Irrisor

Serialized Form
